Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.ar.LineAttributes

  • Packages that use LineAttributes 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.ar
    The AR package provides classes, interfaces and enumerations for displaying LiveSight and customizing the experience.

    • Uses of LineAttributes in com.here.android.mpa.ar

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.ar that return LineAttributes 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LineAttributes LineAttributes.enablePerspective(boolean enable)
      Enable perspective.
      LineAttributes ARPolylineObject.getLineAttributes()
      Get the LineAttributes used for this ARPolyline.
      LineAttributes LineAttributes.setCapStyle(MapPolyline.CapStyle style)
      Set the line end rendering cap style.
      LineAttributes LineAttributes.setDashEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets the appearance as either a dashed or solid line.
      LineAttributes LineAttributes.setDashPrimaryLength(int length)
      Sets a length, in pixels, for the primary dash segment of a dashed line.
      LineAttributes LineAttributes.setDashSecondaryLength(int length)
      Sets a length, in pixels, for the secondary (empty) dash segments of a dashed line.
      LineAttributes LineAttributes.setLineColor(int color)
      Sets line color, using an ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue) integer color value.
      LineAttributes LineAttributes.setLineWidth(int width)
      Sets a line width, in pixels, an int value within the [0..100] range.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.ar with parameters of type LineAttributes 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ARPolylineObject.setLineAttributes(LineAttributes lineAttributes)
      Changes the LineAttributes rendered by this ARPolylineObject
      Constructors in com.here.android.mpa.ar with parameters of type LineAttributes 
      Constructor and Description
      ARPolylineObject(GeoPolyline polyline, LineAttributes lineAttributes)
      Create ARPolylineObject with a GeoPolyline and a line attribute.
